title: Network Javascript based LTC (litecoin) Miner boot disc
description:
Intro:
  Uses ARP spoofing to MITM the machines on the network,
  posing as the gateway, then modifies http traffic to
  inject a Litecoin miner written in Javascript into each
  webpage viewed.  Each page mines on 4 threads by default.


Instructions:

  Burn to CD/DVD or USB stick.
  Boot with bootable CD/DVD/USB.
  Log in with the credentials:

  username:root
  password:miner

  Setup the network with instructions in NETWORK_README.
  Start your network mining by running ./start_miner.


THANKS: slush0, esenminer, ettercap team, and debian.

--oxagast
